subject: Doping (Sports)
Olympic Games
Tests (Drug Use)
Sentences (Criminal)
Olympic Games (2004)
lead_paragraph: Two Greek sprinters accused of faking a motorcycle accident to evade a drug test on the eve of the 2004 Olympics were acquitted by an appeals court in Athens.
snippet: Two Greek sprinters accused of faking a motorcycle accident to evade a drug test on the eve of the 2004 Olympics were acquitted by an appeals court in Athens.
